data_sources.name: Binance
data_sources.description: Provides cryptocurrency price data for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies
example_queries: What was the price of BTC on April 9th at noon ET?
Was Ethereum higher or lower at the end of yesterday than at the start?

data_sources.name: Sports Data IO - MLB
data_sources.description: MLB baseball scores, statistics, and game data
example_queries: What was the score of the Dodgers game?

data_sources.name: Sports Data IO - NBA
data_sources.description: NBA basketball scores, statistics, and game data
example_queries: Who won the Lakers vs Warriors game?
What was the final score of the Celtics game on Tuesday?

data_sources.name: Sports Data IO - NFL
data_sources.description: NFL football scores, statistics, and game data
example_queries: Did the Eagles cover the spread against the Cowboys?
What was the final score of the Chiefs game?

data_sources.name: Sports Data IO - NHL
data_sources.description: NHL hockey scores, statistics, and game data
example_queries: Did the Maple Leafs win yesterday?
What was the score of the Rangers vs Bruins game?

data_sources.name: Sports Data IO - CFB
data_sources.description: College Football (NCAA) scores, statistics, and game data
example_queries: What was the score of the Alabama game last Saturday?
Did Ohio State cover the spread in their last game?

data_sources.name: Sports Data IO - CBB
data_sources.description: College Basketball (NCAA) scores, statistics, and game data
example_queries: What was Duke's score in their last game?
Who won the Kansas vs Kentucky game yesterday?
